resources.string: If you cannot find the food you want or have any comments on us, please contact us through the following form.

Welcome to a new week! Click the add button below to make new plans
Keep going! Try to hit 100% of progress for the workout task this week
Good job! You have finished the workout task this week. Take more exercise if you like
Normal task - recommended for most people\n 300 min moderate or 175 min vigorous activities
Heavy task - for the young\n 420 min moderate or 250 min vigorous activities
Light task - for everyone, just moving!\n 180 min moderate or 100 min vigorous activities
